text: Ivan C. Rutledge was the twelfth Dean of the Ohio State University Moritz College of Law. ==Education== Rutledge received a law degree from the Duke University School of Law and master's of law degree from the Columbia Law School. Category:Duke University School of Law alumni Category:Columbia Law School alumni Category:Moritz College of Law faculty Category:Law school deans Category:American legal scholars
title: Ivan C. Rutledge
